sentences.english: Kim Yaqian suction aspiration nose, hand- wipe the tears off his face.
sentences.chinese: 金亚倩吸吸鼻子，用手擦拭掉自己脸上的泪痕。

sentences.english: How much I want to wipe away the tears in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 我多想为您拭干心中的泪痕。

sentences.english: And let me be Your handkerchief, To gently dry Your tears wept.
sentences.chinese: 我愿是您手中丝绢，轻拭您点点泪痕。

sentences.english: It wipes the sad tear stains on your cheeks dry .
sentences.chinese: 拭干你腮边伤心的泪痕。

sentences.english: I could not bear to look at her tear- streaked face.
sentences.chinese: 我不忍看她那布满泪痕的脸。

sentences.english: For tear stains in a pillow case, treat them the sameway you would a perspiration stain.
sentences.chinese: 至于枕头上的泪痕，处理的方法和清洗汗渍一样。

sentences.english: She wiped her eyes, and a slight smile began to crease her tear-stained cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 她擦了擦双眼，一丝微笑在她满是泪痕的脸上绽开。

sentences.english: But when tears stained thy robe of vestal-whiteness.
sentences.chinese: 贞洁的白袍沾满了你的泪痕。

sentences.english: She dabbed her face quickly in the car to cover the tear stain.
sentences.chinese: 她在车里匆匆擦了点胭脂，以遮盖泪痕。

sentences.english: It wipes the sad tear stains on you cheeks dry.
sentences.chinese: 拭干你腮边伤心的泪痕。

sentences.english: It wipes the sad tear stains on your cheeks dry.
sentences.chinese: 擦干你腮边伤心的泪痕。

definition: outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
to hold in (usually refers the mouth or eyes)
lit. like raindrops on a pear blossom (idiom)/fig. tear-stained face of a beauty
